prs.title: Clean up eviction scan
prs.truncated_body:
# Description

Cleans up eviction scan logic


# Checklist
- [x] Reviewed the [contributing](https://github.com/stellar/stellar-core/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-changes) document
- [x] Rebased on top of master (no merge commits)
- [x] Ran `clang-format` v8.0.0 (via `make format` or the Visual Studio extension)
- [x] Compiles
- [x] Ran all tests
- [ ] If change impacts perform

commits.message: Fix double evict bug in eviction scan

prs.title: feat: integral support for storage transactions + bitcoin transaction processing in transaction
prs.truncated_body:
## Description

Closes: #1194

## Changes

> [!NOTE]
Like 95% of this PR's line count is due to moving/splitting up our stores (`in_memory.rs` and `postgres.rs`). I _did not_ alter any SQL, so the fact that current integration tests also remain unchanged (short of some minor tweaks in `use` statements etc.) and are passing should give a fairly solid indication that the refactor generally do

commits.message: lock to prevent interleaved commit/rollback ops
increment version for writes directly via DbWrite
remove comment about already closed issue
change unrelated log line to trace from debug

prs.title: Add support for component label attestation
prs.truncated_body:
Fixes #6158 

This allows apps to request that the node attests to labels attached to those apps have specific values which can be used to prove specific statements about individual components hosted by a specific node.

commits.message:
Add support for component label attestation

This allows apps to request that the node attests to labels attached
to those apps have specific values which can be used to prove specific
statements about individual components hosted by a specific node.

go: Add CVE-2025-4673 to .nancy-ignore for now

The vulnerability does not affect our use of the library and no
mitigation is currently available.
go: Add CVE-2021-43668 to .nancy-ignore as we don't use LevelDB

prs.title: deps(go): bump the bun group with 3 updates

commits.message:
deps(go): bump the bun group with 3 updates

Bumps the bun group with 3 updates: [github.com/uptrace/bun](https://github.com/uptrace/bun), [github.com/uptrace/bun/dialect/pgdialect](https://github.com/uptrace/bun) and [github.com/uptrace/bun/driver/pgdriver](https://github.com/uptrace/bun).


Updates `github.com/uptrace/bun` from 1.2.11 to 1.2.12
- [Release notes](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/compare/v1.2.11...v1.2.12)

Updates `github.com/uptrace/bun/dialect/pgdialect` from 1.2.11 to 1.2.12
- [Release notes](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/compare/v1.2.11...v1.2.12)

Updates `github.com/uptrace/bun/driver/pgdriver` from 1.2.11 to 1.2.12
- [Release notes](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/uptrace/bun/compare/v1.2.11...v1.2.12)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: github.com/uptrace/bun
  dependency-version: 1.2.12
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
  dependency-group: bun
- dependency-name: github.com/uptrace/bun/dialect/pgdialect
  dependency-version: 1.2.12
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
  dependency-group: bun
- dependency-name: github.com/uptrace/bun/driver/pgdriver
  dependency-version: 1.2.12
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
  dependency-group: bun
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

prs.title: chore: add DataHasher alias of LightHasher
prs.truncated_body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Introduced a new derive macro, `DataHasher`, as an alternative to the existing `LightHasher` macro, supporting the same attributes (`skip`, `hash`).
- **Chores**
  - Updated dependency specification for `groth16-solana` to use a version number instead of a git commit refere

commits.message: chore: add DataHasher alias of LightHasher
chore: replace groth16 solana github dep with release 0.2.0

prs.title: chore: rebase v2 support onto 0.21.0
prs.truncated_body:
- codec still has breaking changes to v1

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Added support for multiple token pools per mint with new instructions for approve, revoke, and delegate compressed token accounts.
  - Introduced batch compress and multi-pool decompression capabilities.
  - Added delegated transfer a

prs.title: Return empty contract results when timestamp range is empty
prs.truncated_body:
**Description**:

This PR fixes the incorrect contract results response bug:

- Return empty contract results when the timestamp range in the request is empty
- Return `null` next link when the pagination query param's range is empty

**Related issue(s)**:

Fixes #11361 

**Notes for reviewer**:

**Checklist**

- [ ] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.)
- [x] Tested (unit, inte

commits.message:
- shortcut and return empty contract results given empty timestamp range
- generate null next url given empty range

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin@hashgraph.com>
